errors.title: Template Info Missing
errors.message: The required 'templateInfo' field is missing. Please check your configuration.

errors.title: License Not Provided
errors.message: No license key has been provided. Please enter a valid license key to proceed.

errors.title: Invalid License
errors.message: The provided license key is not valid. Please ensure you have entered it correctly.

errors.title: License Expired
errors.message: Your license key has expired. Please renew your license to continue using this feature.

errors.title: Configuration Error
errors.message: An error occurred in the configuration file. Please verify your settings.

errors.title: Server Error
errors.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again later or contact support.

errors.title: Permission Denied
errors.message: You do not have the required permissions to access this feature.

errors.title: Feature Not Supported
errors.message: This feature is not supported with your current license tier. Upgrade your license to access this feature.

errors.title: Unexpected Error
errors.message: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
